[i]Grannvale Emperor[/i] – When Arvis, Emperor of Flame enters, gain control of each creature with mana value 3 or less.
[i]Forged from Flames[/i] – Whenever you attack a player with one or more creatures, exile that many cards from the top of your library. You may play those cards this turn.
[i]Father of The Betrayer[/i] – At thhe beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack, sacrifice Arvis.
[i]Loptr's Pawn[/i] – Discard a card: Add one mana of any color.
